text: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَبِّى وَرَبُّكُمْ فَٱعْبُدُوهُ ۗ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ

translation.en.sahih: Indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. That is the straight path."
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya Allah, Tuhanku dan Tuhanmu, karena itu sembahlah Dia. Inilah jalan yang lurus".
